container.wardmagic.additional_mana_perc: [Ritual] Requires additionally %1$s more Mana per Level.
container.wardmagic.chapter_executing_a_:
Executing a ritual.

Place a magical weapon in the §6Ward Altar§0 and start the ritual. If the §6Ward Altar§0 doesn't have enough mana, deadly matter spreads that will consume the mana of the surrounding. After enough mana is consumed the weapon will drop.
container.wardmagic.chapter_getting_mana:
Getting mana.

Every action that involves wards requires mana. So the more mana you have the stronger you can enchant your weapons. Mana can be stored in a §6Mana Container§0. The main source of mana is the §6Mana Steal Ward§0.
container.wardmagic.chapter_how_find_war:
How to find wards

There are ancient structures scattered around the world. These may contain magical wards. Using a §6Magnifying Glass§0 you can analyze these wards and recreate the using a §6Chalk§0.
container.wardmagic.chapter_magical_weap:
Magical weapons

Using §6Magical Planks§0 obtained by a magical tree you can craft a §6Magical Sword§0 and a §Ward Wand§0. These weapons can be enchanted in ward rituals.
container.wardmagic.chapter_preparing_a_:
Preparing a ritual

Place down a §6Ward Altar§0 and surround it with wards of your choice. Using a §6Ward Compass§0 you can figure out where to place the wards. The more wards of the same type you use the more mana it requires.
container.wardmagic.chapter_range_ward:
Range ward.

Without other wards the §6Range Ward§0 doesn't do anything. But combining it with the §6Fire Ward§0 or the §6Explosion Ward§0 it will execute a range attack.
item.wardmagic.chalk_tooltip: Press %1$s to place the last ward.
ritual.wardmagic.fail: Failed to start ritual. No circular wards were found. Use the ward compass to find out where to place the wards.
wards.wardmagic.capacity_tooltip: Increases the capacity of a mana holder.
wards.wardmagic.explosion_tooltip: Adds the power of explosion to your sword or wand.
wards.wardmagic.fire_tooltip: Adds the power of fire to your wand or sword.
wards.wardmagic.life_steal_tooltip: Steal HP every time a entity is hurt by your sword or wand.
wards.wardmagic.mana_steal_tooltip: Steal mana every time a entity is hurt by your sword or wand.
wards.wardmagic.safety_tooltip: Makes you safer when you put it on your wand or sword.
wards.wardmagic.soul_extractor_tooltip: Extracts mana from souls of killed entities.
wards.wardmagic.strength_tooltip: Sharpens your sword similar to sharpness.
wards.wardmagic.teleportation_tooltip: Adds the ability to teleport to your wand.
wards.wardmagic.wind_tooltip: Adds the power of wind to your wand or sword.
